svg.text: AI Hub Landing Zone - Network Environments
License Plate: da4cf6 | All environments with subnet allocations

g.text: LOG All denied traffic to Log Analytics
Shared services | DevOps tooling | Cross-environment access
Can peer to all non-prod environments for CI/CD
Clients connect via App Gateway + APIM, NOT directly via ExpressRoute to backend services
All AI model endpoints are private. DNS resolution handled by Platform Services centrally.
Cross-environment traffic (dev→prod) is DENIED. Tools env can peer to non-prod for CI/CD.

svg.text: AI Hub Landing Zone - Network Environments | Updated: {{CURRENT_DATE}}
